title: DO NOT TRUST THIS PERSON. HE IS A SCAMMER
body: The account Stop Hooking is sending out a link for free lol skins. It looks legit, but he will just steal your account information. He stole mine, but luckily, I got riot to shutdown the account in time. He is doing this with everyone he comes across. I eventually got him to text me a picture of all of my account info after I made him so angry by telling him I was going to get him banned. He said that he got had my accounts now and was going to change the passwords then unfriended me. Please, for me do not trust this scammer.

replies.body: If someone is offering free RP and the only stipulation is you visiting a website, chances are it's fake and an attempt to steal your personal info. Check out this article on [**phishing attempts**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204230720) for some good info on how to protect your account from things like that!
